name: Upheaval (JoeyvdLooverbosch)
description:
Feel free to leave feedback:

https://forms.gle/VxzHETyrtciyDoZz7

Game Description:

You start the game in a camp where you are told by an NPC that he saved you. Because you have the feeling that you must pay him back, you do all kinds of different assignments for him. 

Controls:

  • Movement = WASD
  • Interact = E
  • Progress Dialogue = Spacebar
